title: Haplotype
description: A set of non-overlapping Allele members that co-occur on the same molecule.

id.description: The 'logical' identifier of the entity in the system of record, and MUST be represented as a CURIE. This 'id' is unique within a given system, but may also refer to an 'id' for the shared concept in  another system (represented by namespace, accordingly).

members.description: List of Alleles, or references to Alleles, that comprise this Haplotype.
